content: you poke the needle through insert your hook into the loop closest to the eye of the needle so you don t lose this loop 3 pull the needle through keeping the loop on the hook 8 4 thread the other yarn end onto your needle and pass the needle through the loop on your hook as soon as you get the needle into the loop you can remove the hook so it s out of the way 5 weave the needle back and forth through the new piece of yarn a few times and pull it through 6 trim the ends pinch and roll the join in your fingertips to smooth it out then continue crocheting still having trouble check out tamara kelly s video tutorials on her excellent crochet blog moogly she shows how to hold the yarn and hook how to make a slipknot how to make a chain and how to half_double_crochet http //www mooglyblog com/learn-how-to-crochet/ left handed video http //www mooglyblog com/how-to-crochet-left-handed/ here s a c2c video tutorial from the crochet crowd http //thecrochetcrowd com/cornertocorner/ russian join video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=9mxt2mrr894 9
